description: This file defines a Spring Data JPA repository interface for WishlistItem entities, providing database access methods for wishlist items in the application.

classes.name: WishlistItemRepository
classes.description: Repository interface for WishlistItem entities, extending JpaRepository to provide CRUD operations and custom queries.

methods.name: findByWishlistAndProduct
methods.description: Retrieves an Optional containing WishlistItem based on a specific Wishlist and Product.
